description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A synopsis of the characters of the Carboniferous Limestone Fossils of Ireland. Prepared by F. M'Coy for Sir R. Griffith, by whom is now appended a list of the fossil localities, as arranged for the Journal of the Geological Society of Dublin. ... With twenty-nine lithographic plates" Author: MACCOY, Frederick - Sir, K.C.M.G Contributor: GRIFFITH, Richard John - Sir, Bart Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7107.g.14." Page: 327 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1862 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002307529 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
